Login.QuickandEasyAccessDescription: With your ScentAir Account Center there's no need to call for your day to day account questions, saving you valuable time throughout your day. For added convenience we've made it easier to enroll in our hassle-free autopay. You can just set your payment schedule and get back to what matters most—your customers!
Login.RegisterDescription: When you register you can manage your account from anywhere:
Login.RegisterBulletPoint2: Enroll in our hassle free autopay*

Register.CustomerIDNumberToolTip: ? - You can find this number on the top right corner of the original agreement or any invoice
Register.PINNumberToolTip: ? - Refer to the Welcome Email you received. Don't have this? Please contact us.
Register.UserNameToolTip: Must be at least 7 characters long
Register.PasswordToolTip: Password must be at least 8 characters long, contain one uppercase, one lowercase, one number, and one special character (@, #, %, &, +, !, ?)
Register.PrivacyandTermsofUse: Check here to indicate that you have read and agree to our
Register.MotherMaidenName: What is your Mother's maiden name?
Register.BornCity: In what city where you born?
Register.CarBrand: What brand was your first car?
Register.Friend: Name of your childhood best friend?
Register.UserNameValidation: Username must consist of the letters A-Z and/or the numbers 0-9 only
Register.CheckBoxValidation: Check here to indicate that you have read and agree to our
Register.UserNameCharLength: Username must be at least 7 characters
Register.PasswordCharLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long, contain one uppercase, one lowercase, one number, and one special character (@, #, %, &, +, !, ?)
Register.PasswordContains: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character
Register.ErrorMessage1: This account has already been registered. If needed, you may reset your username or password
Register.ToViewDetails: to view account details, make payments and add additional users.

ForgotUsername.HeaderLabel: Please enter your ScentAir Customer ID number and Email address. We will send you an email with your Username
ForgotUsername.AccountPopOver: You can find this number on the top right corner of the original agreement or any invoice
ForgotUsername.EmailAddressPopOver: Enter the email address used during initial Registration

ForgotPassword.HeaderLabel: Enter your Username and an email will be sent to reset your password:

AccountSummary.AvailableInUSnCANAccounts: ?   Currently available in US & CAN accounts
AccountSummary.AccountSummaryDescription: Welcome to your ScentAir Account Center. From here you can quickly access, view, download and print your account invoices. Plus pay your invoices via your preferred payment method from anywhere, at anytime.
AccountSummary.AvailableInUSnCANNote: *Option currently available for US & CAN Accounts
AccountSummary.InvoicePayTitle: Select invoices to pay. Invoices with Payment Terms of 'Due on 1st', 'Net 30 CC' and 'NET30AUTOPAY' will automatically be charged against the payment method on file. Allow pop-ups.
AccountSummary.PaymentNote: Payments received after 5:00 EST will reflect after 10:00 AM EST the next business day.

PayNow.PaymentInvoices: You are making a payment on the following invoices.
PayNow.AutopayMethodCannotDeleted: For security reasons the AUTOPAY enrolled payment method cannot be immediately deleted and it may take up to 72 hours for the deletion request to take place.
PayNow.selectedServiceCharge: Selected Payment Method to automatically charge your Scent Service Fee
PayNow.ElectronicPaymentTermsAndCondition: ScentAir Electronic Payment Terms and Conditions
PayNow.PaymentCompleteWarning: Do not click SUBMIT again or hit the back button until Payment Transaction is complete
PayNow.AgentAuthority: that Agent (i) is authorized to sign and legally bind Subscriber to contracts and to select Subscriber’s recurring Payment Type, and (ii) has corrected any errors in the above fields and will supply accurate details about Subscriber’s Payment Type in the subsequent screens that are provided by Chase Paymentech;
PayNow.EnrollmentAndAuth1: the below “Enrollment & Authorization of Recurring Payments” (“
PayNow.EnrollmentAndAuth2: ”) on behalf of Subscriber, which Authorization is incorporated herein;
PayNow.description1: that Agent (i) has made a copy of the Authorization for Subscriber's records, and (ii) confirms Subscriber's signature and delivers the Authorization for ScentAir's acceptance (in its discretion); and
PayNow.description2: to the processing of any outstanding balance on Subscriber’s account and understands that the enrolled credit card will be charged in that amount without any further authorization.
PayNow.description4: The Subscriber named in the “Environmental Scent Service Agreement” (“ESS”) between Subscriber and ScentAir, hereby authorizes ScentAir, for the term of the ESS, to obtain funds from the “Payment Type” selected above for purposes of paying amounts, including late charges and other fees, now or later due from Subscriber as specified in ScentAir invoices (“
PayNow.description5: ”). Subscriber agrees that all ESS-related transactions are and will always be primarily for business purposes and that Subscriber is and will remain the owner of the bank, or credit card, account specified during enrollment (“
PayNow.description6: ”). Subscriber agrees that this Authorization will remain in effect until subscriber cancels it by providing notice via the below “Cancellation Mechanism” at least fifteen (15) days prior to the next invoice billing date. Subscriber agrees that it will still owe the Invoice Amount(s) to the extent ScentAir is not able to obtain payment via Subscriber’s Payment Type. ScentAir reserves all rights. As used above, “Cancellation Mechanism” means notice to ScentAir either (a) at 3810 Shutterfly Road, Suite 900, Charlotte, NC 28217 by certified mail, or (b) via email at
PayNow.description7: , which notice shall state (i) the date of notice delivery and Subscriber’s Customer ID #, (ii) the effective date for cancellation of the recurring payment method, and (iii) the payment method Subscriber will use post-cancellation.
PayNow.description8: If the “Payment Type” is “ACH CCD,” Subscriber agrees to the General Terms and to the rules of the National Automated Clearinghouse (“NACHA” or “ACH”) now or later in effect. In addition, Subscriber authorizes ScentAir to debit the Invoice Amounts (which may vary in amount) on, or shortly before or after, the invoice due date from the bank account indicated in the Enrollment Screens (as updated). Subscriber agrees to: (a) timely notify ScentAir of any changes in Subscriber’s account information; and (b) reimburse ScentAir for all penalties and fees incurred as a result of any rejection of ScentAir’s request for account funds for any reason, including insufficient or unavailable funds or as a result of the account not being properly configured (such as for ACH transactions). Subscriber agrees that if an Invoice Amount is returned unpaid: (a) ScentAir may at its discretion attempt to process it as allowed by applicable NACHA rules, and (b) ScentAir may also make an ACH debit for a returned item fee of at least $4.50 or any greater amount that ScentAir is directly or indirectly obligated by NACHA rules to bear in relation to returned items.
PayNow.description9: If the “Payment Type” is “Credit Card,” Subscriber agrees to the General Terms. Subscriber also agrees to all terms of the ACH Authorization, except that the NACHA rules will not apply and these differences will apply: (i) the account will be Subscriber’s credit card account instead of its bank account and if a charge is rejected, ScentAir will not resubmit the charge or seek a returned item fee except as allowed by applicable card brand rules; and (ii) Subscriber acknowledges ScentAir’s cancellation and refund policies regarding ScentAir products.
PayNow.description10: This Authorization supplements the ESS by providing the method and terms for payment by Subscriber of amounts due under the ESS.
PayNow.description11: Subscriber agrees to the terms contained in ScentAir’s Privacy Policy https://www.scentair.com/legal/privacy as they may be updated from time to time and agrees that it will refer to https://www.scentair.com/legal/privacy.html for all information related to ScentAir’s Privacy Policy and any additional rights Subscriber may have related to these Terms and Conditions and this Authorization, as well as any rights related to Subscriber’s data in general.
PayNow.PaymentAlert: Payments received after 5:00 EST will reflect after 10:00AM EST the next business day.

PaymentProfile.PaymentMethodsDesc: Here you can enroll additional payment methods. We accept all major credit cards and ACH (Electronic Check)*
PaymentProfile.USCCANOption: *Option currently available for US & CAN Accounts
PaymentProfile.SelectedPaymentValidationMessage: Selected Payment Method to automatically charge your Scent Service Fee
PaymentProfile.SecurityReasonDesc: For security reasons the AUTOPAY enrolled payment method cannot be immediately deleted and it may take up to 72 hours for the deletion request to take place.
PaymentProfile.PaymentReceivedTimeDesc: Payments received after 5:00 EST will reflect after 10:00AM EST the next business day.
PaymentProfile.AutoPayDisabledDesc: Auto Pay is disabled due to outstanding invoices!

ContactUs.AllCountries: All other Countries in Continental Europe & EMEA: +33 (0)5 62 57 63 20

PaymentAutoPay.AccountOptionDesc: *Option currently available for US & CAN Accounts
PaymentAutoPay.AutoPayDesc: For added convenience and time savings, AUTOPAY* lets you set automatic payments for your account. Once enrolled we will simply charge your Scent Service Fee automatically via your preferred payment method.
PaymentAutoPay.PaymentTermsNote: Note it can take up to 1 full billing cycle for your AutoPay to start once you enroll. Please continue to pay as usual until you see ‘Net30AUTOPAY’ on your PDF invoice in the Payment Terms section
PaymentAutoPay.ChargesNoteDesc: (Charges are typically applied on the first business day of the month.)
PaymentAutoPay.InvoiceNoteDesc: All Open invoices must be paid in full before enrolling in AUTOPAY
PaymentAutoPay.PaymentMethodChargesDesc: Payment Method will be used to automatically charge your Scent Service Fee
PaymentAutoPay.ScentAirTermsConditionDesc: ScentAir Electronic Payment Terms and Conditions

PaymentAutoPay.AUTOPAYUnenrollmentRequestDesc: AUTOPAY unenrollment requested - Please allow up to 72 hours to for AUTOPAY unenrollment to take affect.

ForgotPasswordConfirmation.EmailSent: A password reset email has been sent to the email address associated to the account. Please allow 30 minutes for the email to arrive. Bear in mind that some email applications may flag this email as spam. After 30 minutes if you have not received the password reset email, please contact your Customer Care Representative at:

ForgotUserNameConfirmation.EmailSent: An email containing your username has been sent to the email address associated to the account. Please allow 30 minutes for the email to arrive. Bear in mind that some email applications may flag this email as spam. After 30 minutes if you have not received the email, please contact your Customer Care Representative at:
